text: Pete Sampras was the defending champion, but lost in the final this year. Patrick Rafter won the title, defeating Sampras 1–6, 7–6(7–2), 6–4 in the final. == Seeds == The top eight seeds received a bye to the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== == References == Singles
title: 1998 Great American Insurance ATP Championships – Singles
